This Morning viewers were in hysterics today as Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield tested out umbrellas - and it turned into a bit of a disaster.

The ITV daytime show's consumer expert Alice Beer invited Holly and Phil to be part of her umbrella segment today.

This included using a wind machine to see whether they turned inside-out and, unsurprisingly, it quickly turned into mayhem.

Holly and Phil were blown backwards, the silver fox's face a picture as his umbrella hat quickly flew off.

And fans found the whole segment utterly hilarious.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

One tweeted: "Phil and Holly testing umbrellas against a wind machine is a highlight of my week #ThisMorning @Schofe @hollywills."

While another commented: "That has to be the funniest segment ever!! Who knew umbrella's could be so funny. #ThisMorning."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

A third remarked: "actually howlin at phil #thismorning."

Another wrote: "In absolute stitches watching the umbrella testing making working from home a lot more entertaining @thismorning @ITV #ThisMorning #WorkingFromHome."

One joked: "The hair department are going mad over this item. #ThisMorning @thismorning."

*This Morning airs weekdays at 12.30pm on ITV
description: This Morning consumer expert Alice Beer invited Holly and Phil to be part of her umbrella segment today - and it all went a bit haywire
